insights.populationGrowth: Slight decline -0.2% due to youth outmigration to urban areas.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate 79% literacy with traditional farming knowledge strong.

insights.temperature: Subtropical climate, mild winters (10°C), hot summers (30°C). Lower elevation agriculture zone.
insights.precipitation: High 2,100mm with intense monsoons supporting rice cultivation.
insights.seasonality: Mild winter, hot pre-monsoon, heavy monsoon, pleasant post-monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe monsoon flooding, landslides, crop diseases, pest outbreaks.

recentEvents.impact: Major crop losses, food security concerns

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Low - Rural agricultural area with limited resources
